about_the_game:
Embark on a perilous journey as Sylvia the Squirrel in this thrilling roguelike adventure. When a meteor strikes, Sylvia finds herself trapped in a vast cave system teeming with hostile living rocks. Help her climb back to her home tree by conquering randomly generated caves and overcoming relentless challenges.

Key Features:
  • Procedurally Generated Caves: Each playthrough offers a unique experience as you navigate through dynamically generated cave levels.
  • Powerful Item Synergies: Discover and collect a wide variety of items that can be stacked to create powerful builds and synergies, enhancing your abilities and survival chances.
  • Color Absorption and Spellcasting: Absorb colors from enemies and harness their power to cast awe-inspiring color spells. Each color possesses distinct effects, and by mixing colors, you can create new and devastating spell combinations.
  • Strategic Decision-Making: Adapt on the fly as you strategically choose which colors to mix and combine with different spells. Experiment with various ways of casting spells and see how they are best combined with the different colors.
  • Challenging Roguelike Gameplay: Progress through levels, starting from the bottom of the cave system and ascending towards Sylvia's home. But be warned, death means starting over from square one. Can you overcome the odds and reach the surface?

    Dive into this captivating adventure, where quick thinking, strategic choices, and mastery of color magic are your keys to success. Can you guide Sylvia back to her beloved tree and escape the treacherous caves? The challenge awaits!

name: Painted Peril
short_description: Take up the paintbrush and unleash the power of color with Sylvia the painter mage squirrel. Mix pigments, cast paint spells, and battle living rocks in a vibrant world of magic and adventure.
